content: {"name": "Catholic Charities Brockton", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Client can visit every 10 days", "email": "", "url": "https://www.ccab.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "169 Court Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Brockton", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02302", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.085444, "longitude": -71.01419369999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(508) 587-0815", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "19:45"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "19:45"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "18:00", "closes_at": "19:45"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
